ygData.subject: Re: Standing Down
ygData.msgSnippet: We re heading for the old cave whenever Kit Kat s ready he stared off into the light morning sky again wondering if he d ever get the chance to see it again,

"We're heading for the old cave whenever Kit Kat's ready" he stared off into
the light morning sky again wondering if he'd ever get the chance to see it
again, or a first time as the case was, is, will be, whatever. These time
travel things confused him. "Kit Kat should be able to track Megatron from
there." He placed a hand on his launcher, it wasn't much of a weapon but it
had served him well in the past, future, whatever.

He turned to look Destructor in the eyes "So what's your stake in this war?
What do you hope to achieve." he kept his eight eyes on Destructor awaiting
his response. nobot in thier right mind would volentarily step into the
middle of an ongoing war, help strangers, and assist in an attack without
having higher stakes in mind.

----- Original Message -----
From: <kinger01030@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, October 08, 2000 10:45 AM
Subject: Re: Standing Down


> Destructor nodded. "Thats fine as long as you  have a good reason." He
knew
> Megatron had to be stopped. "So when do we attack? My four horsmen are
> ready." Peastelence, War,famine and Death rose from behind him. There eyes
> burning red.
>
